SetWatchdog.description: This action is used to set the watchdog timeout interval.
SetWatchdog.longDescription: This action shall set the watchdog timeout interval. The watchdog state will reset to its factory default setting of disabled upon reset to defaults.

TimeoutInterval.description: The watchdog timeout interval to be set.
TimeoutInterval.longDescription: The watchdog timeout interval to be set in minutes with a supported range of 0 to 5. If the value is non-zero, the watchdog will be enabled with the specified timeout interval, if zero, it will be disabled.
